trans-unit.source: Follow the steps at <link><linkText>Installing a Client SSL Signing Identity on the Server</linkText><title></title></link> to export the certificate you downloaded in the previous step to a .p12 file.
trans-unit.target: Follow the steps at <link><linkText>Installing a Client SSL Signing Identity on the Server</linkText><title></title></link> to export the certificate you downloaded in the previous step to a .p12 file.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, click Mobile Services > your app > the Push tab > apple push notification settings > "Upload.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, click Mobile Services > your app > the Push tab > apple push notification settings > "Upload.

trans-unit.source: Upload the .p12 file, making sure that the correct Mode is selected (either Sandbox or Production, corresponding to whether the client SSL certificate you generated was Development or Distribution.)
trans-unit.target: Upload the .p12 file, making sure that the correct Mode is selected (either Sandbox or Production, corresponding to whether the client SSL certificate you generated was Development or Distribution.)

trans-unit.source: Your mobile service is now configured to work with push notifications on iOS!
trans-unit.target: Your mobile service is now configured to work with push notifications on iOS!
